mapper.select: select * from product order by pId desc
select pId from product where pName=#{pName}
mapper.insert: insert into product (pId, pUDate, pName, cId, tId, pUphit) values (nextval(product_SEQ), sysdate(), #{pName}, #{cId}, #{tId}, 0)
mapper.update: update product set pUDate=sysdate(), pName=#{pName}, cId=#{cId}, tId=#{tId} where pId = #{pId}
update product set pUphit = pUphit+1 where pId=#{pId}
mapper.select: select img.pId, img.pImg, vod.pVod from product_img img join product_vod vod on img.pId=vod.pId where img.pId=#{pId};
mapper.update: update product_img img inner join product_vod vod on img.pId=vod.pId set img.pImg = #{pImg}, vod.pVod = #{pVod} where img.pId = #{pId};
